projects.title: Online Taxi Booking
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. The most expanded website I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. It is use for travelling. You can easily book taxi from our website.

projects.title: Efficient Doctor Patient Portal
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. EDPP(Efficient Doctor Patient Portal) You can book online appoinment. Enabled online appointment booking with downloadable appointment details. Added functionality to browse and select from multiple available doctors. Extended features to ensure smooth user interaction and efficient appointment management

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
